body:
Overview

You can end an interview from within the HackerRank Interview when required. HackerRank Interview can be ended in two ways, one is to end only for you and the interview will continue if other interviews are available online. The other one is to end the interview for all.

Leave or End an Interview

  1. Click Exit on the top right corner of the page.
    • Under that, click Leave Interview to leave the interview.
    • Click End Interview for all to end the interview for all.
  2. Before you leave, rate your interviewing experience and give feedback or suggestions. Click on Continue to report to view the interview report. This is optional and shows if you click Give Feedback.

 You can reopen an interview or view the report in your HackerRank for Work account after closing the interview. A pop-up message confirming the end of the interview appears on the screen.
title: Ending an Interview
